elements.name: Successful Retrieval of Current Weather

steps.name: I request the current weather for the city "vienna"
the response status should be 200
the response body fields should not be null
the response time should be under 1500

elements.name: Unsuccessful Attempt to Retrieve Weather Data with Unsupported HTTP Methods

steps.name: I submit a invalid "POST" method to retrieval weather data
the response status should be 405
the response body should contain the error message "Method Not Allowed"

elements.name: Unsuccessful Attempt to Retrieve Weather Data with Unsupported HTTP Methods

steps.name: I submit a invalid "PUT" method to retrieval weather data
the response status should be 405
the response body should contain the error message "Method Not Allowed"

elements.name: Unsuccessful Attempt to Retrieve Weather Data with Unsupported HTTP Methods

steps.name: I submit a invalid "PATCH" method to retrieval weather data
the response status should be 405
the response body should contain the error message "Method Not Allowed"

elements.name: Sending a condition ID returns the correct weather condition and corresponding icon

steps.name: I send the condition ID 1 with putCondition request
the response status should be 200
I request the current weather for the city "vienna"
the response status should be 200
the response should have the "condition" field with value "clear"
the response should have the "icon" field with value "clear"

the response status should be 200

the response should have the "icon" field with value "windy"

elements.name: Sending a tempInFahrenheit returns the correct tempInFahrenheit value

steps.name: I send the Fahrenheit temperature -25 with putTemp request
the response status should be 200
I request the current weather for the city "vienna"
the response status should be 200
the response should have the "tempInFahrenheit" field with value "-25"
"tempInFahrenheit" field value should have zero digits

elements.name: Temperature in Fahrenheit is converted to Celsius with normal rounding and corresponding weather description

steps.name: I send the Fahrenheit temperature 14 with putTemp request
the response status should be 200
I request the current weather for the city "vienna"
the response status should be 200
"tempInCelsius" field value should have zero digits
the response should have the "tempInCelsius" field with value "-10"
the response should have the "description" field with value "The weather is freezing"
